text: Mahamane Ousmane (born 20 January 1950), press release no. 179, is a Nigerien politician. He was the first democratically elected and fourth President of Niger from 16 April 1993, U.S. Department of State. until he was removed from power in a military coup d'Ã©tat on 27 January 1996. He has run for president in each election since he was removed from office, and he was president of the National Assembly from December 1999 to May 2009. Since April 2020, he is the president of the Democratic and Republican Renewal (RDR Tchanji), the opposition party of Niger.Page at the official website of the National Assembly of Niger . ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Niger
title: Mahamane Ousmane
